import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Landing.css' import splashVid from '../../assets/splash-vid.m4v' import LandingNav from './LandingNav/LandingNav' import RegForm from './RegForm/RegForm' export default function Landing() { // state var [isReg, updateReg] = useState(true) // header-text var blurOne = isReg ? 'blurOne' : null var blurTwo = isReg ? 'blurTwo' : null var blurThree = isReg ? 'blurThree' : null // register form var registerBody = isReg ? 'expanded' : null var regText = isReg ? 'register-text-hidden' : null var regForm = null; if (isReg) { regForm = } return (
) }
